I'll let you switch weapons for training!

STEP ON A LOCKED STAIRCASE TO LEARN HOW TO UNLOCK THE OTHER CHARACTERS

Defeat an enemy in the crypt to unlock them here.

Choose a boss to train against!

翻译结果: 跳舞毯模式！难度已降低。

翻译结果: 一次使用所有九个角色

english: Complete all zones in one run!
but you start with lower health.

翻译结果: 所有人会都会挑战相同的地下城

english: Score = coin total when run ends.

english: I'll let you train against enemies!
翻译结果: 挑种怪物来做你的陪练吧

COMPLETE THE GAME WITH MELODY TO UNLOCK!
COMPLETE ZONE 4 WITH CADENCE TO UNLOCK!

COMPLETE AN ALL CHARS RUN TO UNLOCK!
翻译结果: 解锁条件：使用所有角色通关（不包括Coda）

english: DID YOU BRING THE GLASS KEY?
YOU HAVE NO ITEM IN THAT SLOT!
翻译结果: 你的该装备栏没有物品

english: YOU HAVE NO ITEM IN THAT SLOT!
翻译结果: 你的那个物品栏了没东西！
鲜血圣陵：使用生命换取鲜血武器
玻璃圣陵：身上所有物品变为玻璃材质
和平圣陵：使用全部物品换取生命
节奏圣陵：身上所有物品变为黑曜石材质，打乱节奏
冒险圣陵：获得物品但缓慢流血
献祭圣陵：献上你的祭品
空间圣陵：获得铲子，扩大地下城空间
战争圣陵：获取物品，更强大的敌人
无悔圣陵：获取武器，永不回头
机遇圣陵：来试试手气吧
停止移动不会丢失金币倍率
可以原地踏步，提升伤害
双倍金币 + 丢失金币
免疫攻击并冰冻所有敌人
更多金币，自动拾取金币
对非飞行敌人造成伤害
转化所有未装备的物品
可以挖掘任何东西，同时受到伤害
金币倍率将强化挖掘能力
吸血攻击，失血增加伤害

english: FREEZE ENEMIES, KILL FROZEN ENEMIES, PIERCING
翻译结果: 冻结敌人，杀死被冻结敌人，冰冷刺骨
远程攻击，需要装填，穿刺
扇形攻击，需要装填，穿刺
远程攻击，需要装填，穿刺

english: YOU CAN USE NUMBERS, LETTERS AND SPACES:
翻译结果: 名字只能使用 字母/数字/空格

english: This game contains many mysterious items!
翻译结果: 地下城里有很多神秘的东西

english: Would you like item hints, or would
翻译结果: 你想显示物品描述还是自己去探索他们的效果呢？

english: you prefer to figure things out as you go?

翻译结果: 所有未花费的钻石会被清空

english: Would you like To stay And spend them?
翻译结果: 你要留下把它们花完吗？
只能使用匕首，一击必杀
你移动时敌人才可以移动
拾取金币立即死亡，商店物品免费
（视金钱如粪土的人，所以不要去捡屎）
你无法造成伤害，出口直接解锁
携带受诅咒的跳跃之靴

english: PLAY ALL CHARACTERS IN A ROW,
PLAY AS CADENCE, THEN MELODY, THEN ARIA.
翻译结果: 依次使用CADENCE，MELODY，ARIA完成故事模式

english: COMPLETE THE WHOLE STORY IN ONE GO!
BEAT ALL ZONES REPEATEDLY WITHOUT DYING.
翻译结果: 在不死亡的情况下完成所有区域

english: ALL ZONES MODE: COMPLETE ALL ZONES IN ONE RUN!
翻译结果: 全区域模式：一次性完成所有区域！

english: ALL LOBBY UPGRADES ARE UNLOCKED AND AVAILABLE,
BUT YOU START WITH LOWER HEALTH.
DAILY CHALLENGE: COMPLETE ALL ZONES IN ONE RUN!
翻译结果: 每日挑战：一次性完成所有区域！

english: ALL PLAYERS GET THE SAME DUNGEON.
翻译结果: 所有人会都会挑战相同的地下城

english: Press an ARROW KEY on the beat, ESC to quit
翻译结果: 按照节拍按 方向 键，按ESC退出

english: Press an ARROW KEY to start
翻译结果: 按 方向键 开始

english: Press ENTER when done to finalize
Press The UP ARROW KEY when you hear the sound.
翻译结果: 当你听到声音时按 ↑ 键

english: Press THE UP ARROW KEY when the heart beats.
翻译结果: 当你听到节拍时按 ↑ 键
或按 S 跳过校准

english: PRESS LEFT OR RIGHT TO ADJUST AUDIO LATENCY.
翻译结果: 按 左右 键调整声音延迟

english: PRESS UP OR DOWN TO ADJUST VIDEO LATENCY.
翻译结果: 按 左右 键调整视频延迟

english: PRESS ENTER TO SAVE AND EXIT.
翻译结果: 按 回车 保存并退出

HIGH SCORES AND ACHIEVEMENTS WILL BE DISABLED

english:
PRESS AN ARROW KEY
ON THE BEAT TO MOVE
翻译结果: 伴着节拍按下方向键来移动

english: I came back to destroy the Lute. I revived the NecroDancer to seek answers, but he betrayed me
You left us. You never came back!
I did what I thought I had to, but I failed.
I blamed you for so long... but I understand now. This thing must be destroyed.
That's right. And only I know how to do it.
Before he betrayed me, he told me the location of the shrine.
No doubt just to buy himself more time.Let's end this.
Octavian was once a bard, struggling to be noticed.
On his travels he stumbled upon the solution to his troubles.
Centuries ago, Octavian fled to the crypt and amassed an undead army.
But the first time I found the crypt, there were no monsters.
After hundreds of years without sleep, the bard had grown weary.
He stopped playing, and so he died.The Lute was lost to legend.
When I came back, I raised him.
Octavian, I know who you are. We need to destroy this lute. It was not meant for mortal hands!
You're right. I will sacrifice myself to destroy it.
I can't trust anyone else with this.
I have already been cursed. Let me atone for what I have done.
Everything comes to an end, my daughter. But for you and your family, not today.
They told me I was too young.
They told me I needed more training.
I told them to drop dead!
I don't know how I survived that fall... something strange must have happened.
翻译结果: 我不知道我掉下来之后是怎么活下来的…但肯定发生了一些奇怪的事情。

english: My pulse is beating like a drum, but my blood is running cold.
翻译结果: 我的身体如火般跳动但是我的血液却逐渐变冷。

english: I'm not sure what's going on, but I came here with a question.
翻译结果: 我不明白接下来将会发生什么，但是我带着我的问题而来。

english: And I'm going to find the answer if it kills me.
翻译结果: 就算因此而死，我也要找到我的答案。

english: Dad was always coming and going on his adventures. But this time he seemed more excited.
翻译结果: 父亲总是来往于他的探险旅途中，但这一次他看起来特别兴奋。

english: He said he'd found it, some great treasure.
翻译结果: 他说他已经找到了，一些很棒的宝藏。

english: When I was older, I found the notes he left behind. Directions to a graveyard.
翻译结果: 当我长大之后，我找到了他留下来的那些笔记。是关于一个墓地的路线记载。

english: Uncle Eli tried to stop me, but Dad had been gone for two years. I had to find him.
翻译结果: 伯父Eli尝试着阻止我，但是父亲已经为此离开了两年了。我必须去找他。

english: Mom died when I was only seven. I heard Dad and Uncle Eli arguing after the funeral.
翻译结果: 母亲在我7岁时就去世了。我听到父亲与伯父在母亲的葬礼上争吵。

english: Now I have no choice, Eli. I have to find the Golden Lute.
翻译结果: 现在我别无选择了，Eli。我必须得去找到那把金鲁特琴。
然后丢下你的孩子不管？

english: With these notes, it shouldn't take long to find…
翻译结果: 有了这些记载上的东西，应该不会需要太长时间的…

english: What was so important about golden loot?
翻译结果: 为什么“金路特勤”看上去这么重要？

english: We were so happy together. Until my mother got sick…
翻译结果: 我们在一起生活的非常幸福快乐，直到我的母亲患病之后…

english: I just wanna help you, Melody. Can't you see that?
翻译结果: 我只是想帮你治好你的病，Melody。你知道吗？

english: There's a reason my mother took that thing away, Dorian. Don't go!
翻译结果: 这就是为什么我母亲带着那把琴离开了，Dorian。别去！

english: I have to find it, I... I have to risk it.
翻译结果: 我必须找到它，我…我必须去冒这个险。

english: Cadence, I'm sorry! I was under his spell…
翻译结果: 我很抱歉…我被法术迷惑了！

english: Leaving so soon? I guess you don't have the HEART to face me!
翻译结果: 不久后就能离开这？我想你们根本就没有信心来面对我！

english: I think I know how to defeat him, Cadence. But we'll have to work together. Follow my lead.
翻译结果: 我觉得我知道应该如何击败他，Cadence。但是我们必须同心协力。来，听我指挥。

english: All along it was a golden lute you were after. But why?
They brought me back using the power of the Golden Lute.
But we soon discovered that the Lute has its restrictions.
To stay alive, we must keep playing.
And the longer we play, the more it robs us of our humanity.
But I know something about the crypt that they don't. And now I need answers.
It was the same plague that had come through our village when I was a child.
I just need to find the Golden Lute. I can save you!
I could see the greed in his eyes, behind the desperation. It was just like before…
My mother left us to get rid of the Lute, just like she left us to find it.
And now I've inherited her burden, but I'll be damned if I'm going to pass it on to my daughter.
The plague had been through the village when I was young. Mom healed the people who were dying.
But they turned against her. They wanted the power of the Lute for themselves.
It's not the Lute that's cursed. It's us.
You're Octavian, aren't you? The bard who sought immortality long ago.
I am, and who are you... besides a thief?
I am Melody, a bard as you once were. I seek to destroy this accursed lute.
You want to destroy it?! The Lute is MINE!
But I have the Lute, Octavian, and if I stop playing, we'll both die.
Try again! Try again, my pets… I find this most amusing.
Try again. Ifind this most amusing!
If I'm gonna survive this, I'll have to remember what eli taught me
Every opponent was a predictable pattern, he daid. Lean that pattern and you won't suffer so much as a scratch.
That green guy didn't move al all, and this blue one jus moves up and then down so if I attack him from the side, I'll never get hurt.
Abroadsword! Not as sharp as I'm used to, but I bet it can still take out 3 enemies in one shot.
Looks like those skeletons put their hands in the air when they're about to jump. If I'm in the waywhen they move ,it's gonna hurt.
That trap is mostly harmless, but eli warned me of deadlier traps to come.
